title: Everything that Ibn Shirin mentioned makes it clear that I saw a sick person in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream? Many people see a sick person in a dream and they are confused and worried about this dream, especially if this sick person is one of the people close to the dreamer, so they resort to searching for the meaning of the vision and the signs it carries. It varies depending on the details of the vision and the condition of the dreamer. The sick person in a dream Seeing the sick person in a dream carries many signs that we can explain in detail in the following points: It may indicate that this sick person is experiencing a loss in reality and may face obstacles in achieving his goals that push him to retreat, or he may give up completely. General about this goal and despair of achieving it. The vision also symbolizes a lack of faith in that person and the dreamer must tell him about this dream so that he can improve his lifestyle and fear God in all his actions so that God (Glory be to Him) is satisfied with him and grants him. His grace is upon him. But if a person sees in his dream that there is a sick person but he is unknown to him, then the vision indicates that the dreamer himself will face some problems in the near future. If the dreamer commits a lot of mistakes in reality, there is a possibility that he will fail in his work or lose in the future. Trade or lose his job, and here the vision suggests that its owner must re-examine and reconsider himself first. That he is not drawn further into the path of sin and it is difficult for him to return. Imam Al-Sadiq said: Seeing a woman in a dream, whether she is unmarried or married, indicates the good qualities that distinguish her and that make her yearn for evil people who take advantage of her goodness. If one sees in a dream that there is a dead person In reality, but he saw him sick in a dream, it is interpreted that this person did not behave well in reality and that he suffers greatly from his shortcomings in this world. After his death, he needs someone to do some good deeds for him to raise his rank in his subsequent home. In the city of dreams, he informs the family of the deceased about the vision, so that they can offer him many good deeds and alms. As for seeing a patient with stomach cancer, this indicates that he is going through serious difficulties in reality and cannot He bears it and needs someone to provide him with help and assistance. Patience in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The imam said that the appearance of the sick person in the dreamer’s dream is a hypocritical and deceitful person who carries bad qualities, which makes him unacceptable in society. This indicates that he committed many sins and was followed by guidance. If the dreamer personally knows this sick person whom he sees in his dream, then he should alert him and advise him to return to the path of truth and guidance. Daring to confine God Almighty. As for seeing this patient, he is not suffering from any problems or pain. He expresses his position on an important problem in his life that he faced in the previous period, and that he will gain psychological stability after overcoming it. But if this patient makes sounds expressing severe pain, there is a high probability that the viewer will fall into a serious financial crisis in the coming days, and he must prepare for that and bear it. Responsibility for him. Patience in a dream by Ibn Sirini. A sick person dreams of being free of charge. This vision expresses the enjoyment of health, well-being and longevity, and it can also mean that...

title: Interpretation of seeing a crazy person in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Insanity: a mental illness that affects a person who lacks awareness and discrimination. An insane person is someone who has no pen left, meaning he is not responsible for unacceptable or prohibited actions. As for seeing a crazy man in a dream, this makes the dreamer feel curious about the interpretation of this dream. Today, through various, we will find the interpretation of seeing a madman in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq.Interpretation of seeing a madman in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqIn the interpretation of seeing a madman in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq, it was stated that if the dreamer finds a madman in his house in a dream, this is a sign of the anxiety that the dreamer is suffering from due to accumulated debts. Therefore, if the dreamer is a married woman and sees a crazy man in her dream, this symbolizes the presence of some hypocrites around her who do not love her and want bad things for her. In general, Imam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing a crazy man in a dream in many cases is a sign of stress and tension in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a crazy man in a dream with male and female children symbolizes the wealth of the parents. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is crazy, this explains the approaching date of her engagement. And if a pregnant woman sees a crazy person in her dream, this is good news that she will give birth to a boy. While seeing a man A crazy man in a dream refers to the money that this person spends on something worthless. It also indicates his extravagance and waste of money. If the dreamer is a married woman and sees a crazy man in her dream, this is a bad vision for the dreamer and a sign of sadness and pressure in her life. And a divorced woman seeing a crazy man in her dream Evidence of the presence of a hypocritical person in her life who shows her love in front of her, but in reality he hates her and holds a grudge against her. If one sees a crazy friend in a dream, this is interpreted by the death of that friend with financial crises and many debts, but God Almighty will help him pay off his debts in the near future. Interpretation of the vision A crazy man in a dream about the real imam who follows me. If one sees in his dream that he is walking on a street and a crazy man appears and chases him, this means that the dreamer will face some problems at work, but soon they will pass, God willing, and he will get a promotion at work. If a woman sees someone who is not... If a married woman sees a crazy man chasing her in her dream, this symbolizes a change in her situation for the better, the disappearance of her worries and anxieties, and it may be a sign of her imminent marriage. When a divorced woman sees a crazy man following her on her way, this is a sign that she will soon return to her ex-husband. And if the fortuneteller is an old woman She saw a crazy man chasing her, so this is interpreted as the return of a person who has been missing from this woman for a long time. Interpretation of seeing a crazy person in a dream: The real Imam is dead. Imam Al-Sadiq mentions in his interpretation that when the dreamer sees a dead person, he becomes crazy, as this is a symbol of the inheritance that the dreamer will obtain. Read also: The meaning of seeing a dead person. A male child in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a crazy man beating him in a dream. A person who sees a crazy man beating him in a dream indicates a loss for the viewer in his money that he is saving or is thinking about investing in a business. This vision can also serve as a warning to him if he

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the death of a living person in a dream for a single girl. Also, seeing an unmarried girl sees the person she loves alive in wakefulness, and he dies in a dream, and you do not bury him. It indicates that she will receive from this person a very great benefit in her life and she is very pleased. And the meaning of that Also an indication of the blessing and livelihood that will dominate her household at this time. The sudden death of a living person in a dream without illness or fatigue in a dream for a single girl. An indication that they will find in their lives a large inheritance, and soon they will possess it, God willing. It also indicates that they will have A lot of money in her life at this time of her era. An unmarried girl who sees a dream is a sign that she will get rid of the difficult things that are happening to her. It also explains the payment of this single woman’s debts in her life, and God knows best. The dream indicates happy things and abundant livelihood for her and her family. God willing. You may be interested: The deceased asked the living person to go with him. Interpretation of the death of a living person in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees that her husband was dying in a dream in front of her eyes and does not bury him in the dream. It indicates that she will give birth to twins from him, God willing, in the coming period, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And as it appears. She will find a living wage in her life and a lot of money and a lot for her. A married woman who sees in a dream the death of a person she loves and cries. It indicates the long life of this living man and that he lives in happiness and great living. It also shows that the dreamer will obtain a great benefit from that person who He saw it in a dream. A married woman who sees in her dream the death of a living person, and cries a lot over him in the dream. It announces that he will give birth to good offspring and good children, God willing. It also indicates getting rid of the worries and problems that she experiences with her family, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the death of a person Alive in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing that the divorced woman sees in a dream the death of a living person and cries and is very afraid in the dream. This explains the happy life that she will accept after her divorce, God willing. The meaning indicates her extreme fear for her life and her affairs, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if the living person laughs and rejoices with her in In the dream, she dies once in the dream in front of her. The meaning indicates that there are sad things in her life that she gets rid of and lives happily. It also shows the good, calm and stable life that she will live soon, God willing. And the divorced woman who sees the death of a person and cannot bury him in a dream. Here the meaning refers to her love. The big sign of this living person in her life and her extreme fear of him. If she was sure that she would not die in the dream, this indicates that she was very close to him now. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the death of a living person in a dream about a man and its meaning. The dreamer who sees in Dreaming with great intensity the death of a living person who knows him well and is close to him. The meaning indicates getting rid of problems and bad things in this dreamer’s life. It also explains that he will experience abundant blessings and sustenance in his life, and God knows best. A man who sees the death of his dear friend in a dream and cries intensely over his loss The meaning indicates the letter

title: Interpretation of gold bracelets in a dream by Al-Usaimi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Gold bracelets in Al-Osaimi’s dream are among the things that many people, especially women, are looking for, because they are the ones who like to wear gold, knowing that the interpretation of this vision depends on the social and psychological state of the viewer and the circumstances in which he goes. Through this time. Good luck and blessings will come to a person in the near future. Gold bracelets in a dream Al-OsaimiSeeing someone’s golden bracelets in a dream means that this person will pay all the debts accumulated on him, in the event that the person suffers from financial problems. Seeing someone’s golden bracelets in a dream symbolizes that this The person will get rid of the poverty that he has been suffering from for a long time and then he will have a lot of money because of God’s care for him. Seeing someone wearing gold bracelets in a dream is a sign that this person will fulfill all his desires and achieve all his goals. Seeing someone wearing gold bracelets then changes Gold bracelets to silver bracelets at once indicates that this person will suffer a huge loss due to the failure of his business. Seeing someone's old gold bracelets in a dream expresses the state of stress and tension that that person is experiencing due to constant and constant thinking about the future and focusing on it and not paying attention to the present. Gold bracelets in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing someone’s golden bracelets in a dream expresses the extent of luxury and comfort that the dreamer enjoys. Seeing gold bracelets in a dream indicates that the person is ambitious and is trying in various ways to achieve what he wants. If An employee saw golden bracelets in a dream, which means that this employee will receive a promotion or a material reward due to his diligence in work and increased production. Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing golden bracelets may be an unpleasant vision for the dreamer, and he based his interpretation on the fact that the bracelets are wrapped around the hands. . Therefore, seeing someone wearing gold bracelets in a dream indicates restricting the person and not taking his freedom in something. Seeing someone wearing gold bracelets in a dream indicates the humiliation and humiliation that he is exposed to and spreading bad words about the dreamer. Gold bracelets in Al-Osaimi’s dream for a single woman, seeing bracelets A single gold woman in a dream means that she will receive a lot of good and abundant sustenance in her life. If an unmarried woman sees herself in a dream wearing golden bracelets, this means that she is committed to following the truth and abstaining from falsehood; Because she wants not to anger God and wants to stay away from sins. Seeing individual golden bracelets in a dream is a sign that she has achieved her goals that she has been striving to achieve for a long time. Seeing individual golden bracelets in a dream means that she will obtain abundant goodness in her life, God willing. Gold bracelets on The shape of a snake in a dream for a single woman. Seeing single gold bracelets in the shape of a snake in a dream means that misfortunes will befall her and that she will face many problems in the coming days. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream bracelets made of gold in the shape of a snake, this means

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing anger in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see anger in a dream, symbol of anger in a dream for a single, married or pregnant woman, indications of the anger of the mother and father, the meaning of angry crying, visions of someone’s anger towards you, interpretation of a dream about anger from God, and anger is a feeling of emotion when upset by a situation or A person in reality, but when we see him in our dreams we feel fear and confusion, and we do not know the correct interpretation, and therefore today we will learn through the interpretation of seeing anger in a dream in detail.Interpretation of a dream about anger by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about anger in a dream as mentioned by Ibn Sirin in its relationship to feelings of anxiety, tension, and fear of Viewer of the future. Seeing anger and screaming in a dream is evidence of changing the dreamer’s life for the better and improving his psychological and financial condition and his ability to overcome crises. Dreaming of getting angry at someone in a dream is one of the desired dreams that shows a lot of goodness and getting rid of disputes with others. Seeing anger at the family in a dream Evidence of the blessing of money and a large number of material losses for me and an increase in his debts. The dream of seeing anger and suffocation in a dream could be the result of a really angry person feeling angry and must be patient and think wisely. Interpretation of seeing anger for a single womanInterpretation of a dream of anger and crying in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence On good luck and the fulfillment of desires and aspirations in her personal and professional life. Seeing anger in an unmarried woman’s dream is unpleasant visions that indicate that she is in a state of fear, sadness, and feelings of despair and disappointment. Seeing a mother’s anger in a single woman’s dream can be a warning and a warning to stop her inappropriate behavior. Moral. Dreaming of a lover’s anger in an unmarried woman’s dream is an indication of engagement, marriage, and her happiness about it. Interpretation of a dream of anger for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a father’s anger in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she will face many problems and disagreements with her husband. A dream of a dead man’s anger in a dream may indicate A married woman means something bad for her or one of her family members. Seeing parents’ anger in a dream for a married woman means that she hears a lot of sad news and a large number of misfortunes in her family. Seeing her husband’s anger in a married woman’s dream is an indication that she will have quarrels and problems with him, but she It will end soon. Interpretation of a vision of anger for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream of anger at a husband in a dream about a pregnant woman is evidence of premature birth, but it will be a smooth and easy natural birth. Seeing rape and beating of a sister in a pregnant woman’s dream in the first months means that she will give birth to the child she wants, whether male or female. The anger of the dead in a dream. The anger of the deceased towards the fortuneteller in a dream indicates the presence of serious mistakes in his life, including matters related to his behavior or behavior, some of which are related to his choices. Absolute knowledge and its appearance in a dream is a message whose content is what he said or what comes from the action or feelings he expresses, and therefore the dreamer must pay attention to the anger of the deceased in his dreams in particular. If the deceased was the father, mother, husband or wife. The anger of the lover or friend

title: Interpretation of gold in a dream for a woman

preview.html: Seeing gold in a dream can be interpreted as a good sign indicating a bright future and financial benefits for the seeker and it can be interpreted as difficult times that will come for the seeker. Follow us for the interpretation of gold in a dream for a woman. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream Some dream interpreters have interpreted that seeing gold in a dream is linked to the acquisition of material wealth. Seeing himself holding gold in his hands in a dream means that the dreamer will succeed in the work he is doing. If you dream of finding gold in Your dream, it means that there will be a good opportunity to reveal your talent and it can be the beginning of starting a successful career. If you dream that you lose gold in your dream, it means that you will not be able to take advantage of some opportunities that come your way. Seeing gold can be interpreted In a dream it is good skin for the seeker, because he will have good luck, wealth, healing and happiness in the future. Seeing himself melting gold in his dream means that he will quarrel with others about an unpleasant matter and people will discuss his life. If one sees himself dropping gold, this indicates that he will suffer loss. And harm. A person who sees his house made of gold in a dream warns him that his house will be exposed to fire. When a person sees his eyes made of gold in his dream, it means that he will be blind, God forbid. Whoever sees himself in his house using gold and silver utensils in a dream symbolizes To his sins and misdeeds. Seeing gold in a dream, hidden in a place known to the dreamer, or covered with mud, means that he has not done anything. If one sees in his dream that he is wearing gold jewelry, it means that he will marry someone who does not suit him. Interpretation of seeing gold as a gift in a dreamIf you see Someone gives a large piece of gold to someone, it means that he will gain power, position, or status in the near future. Interpretation of seeing yourself burying gold in a dream: Dreaming of burying gold or hiding it represents the desire of an intelligent person to hide something valuable from himself because he does not want others to be able Of access to this thing or does not want to share it with them. Interpretation of a dream about gold jewelryThe meaning of a dream about gold jewelry is often related to love. If you see yourself giving gold jewelry to someone you love, it means that you are missing someone and the dream reminds you of the need to keep in touch with those who have disappeared from Your life.Interpretation of a dream about a gold chainSeeing a gold chain in a dream symbolizes that the ties between you and your partner, friend, or relative will become stronger.Interpretation of a dream about gold coinsSeeing gold coins in a dream is a sign of success at work and obtaining a lot of money.Interpretation of seeing a gold necklace In a dream, if you see a gold necklace in a dream, this means that you will be able to obtain desires that you could not achieve or achieve before. Interpretation of seeing a gold bullion in a dream If one sees himself in a dream acquiring a gold bullion, this means that he will fall into sadness like the gold that He obtained it, or he will be angry with the Sultan. Interpretation of seeing golden bracelets in a dream: Seeing gold or silver walls in a dream symbolizes that...

title: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of breastfeeding a child in a dream for a single woman. Single women who had delayed marriage and did not find a suitable life partner for her when she dreamed that she was breastfeeding a child, which is a sign of the psychological problems and sadness that she is experiencing at that time. If a girl sees that she is breastfeeding a child and there is no milk in her breast and she is sad Accordingly, this means that she is going through an internal psychological crisis that prompts her to isolate herself from people, so we need to quickly get out of this crisis. As for the person who dreams of breastfeeding a child and being full? Several days ago, this means that she will get a good job and earn a lot of money. As for the person Whoever was busy with a job, dreamed that he was breastfeeding a child, and in the dream he was satisfied with its color, it is good to have a man with morals and countryside propose for marriage. For her. The meaning of dreaming about breastfeeding an unmarried child. An unmarried woman who dreams that she is breastfeeding a man means that there is a married man with a male child who will propose to her and she will agree. Perhaps the vision means that she will be engaged to a man who is not wealthy and suffers from a lack of materials, but he will agree and cooperate in their marital life in the future. A dream about breastfeeding a male child, but she vomited after he suffocated her. This is a sign of the progress of a narcissistic man and an engagement will occur, but she will retract this decision after it affects her thoughts and makes her hesitate in her thoughts and decisions. If she sees a smiling child being breastfed, this means that the dreamer will marry the man she loves. She desires it and will be happy with it. A dream about breastfeeding a child and crying from dryness. Milk on a girl’s chest indicates that she will be exposed to a major financial crisis that may lead her into debt. In the event that the dreamer is engaged and sees her breasts drying up in the dream, this means that she sees the drying and fading of feelings between her and her fiancé and the engagement will end. Interpretation A single woman’s dream of breastfeeding. If a single girl dreams that she is breastfeeding a baby boy or girl, a bottle, then this dream shows her complete dependence on others to accomplish all the tasks assigned to her at work. It can also clarify that it is difficult to rely on her at home and in her duties as a mother and head of the family. Interpretation of seeing a bottle of milk for a child in a dream: If A single, feral girl saw milk for children. This dream shows in her dream the abundance of goodness and the livelihood that comes to her, and it also shows her generosity and giving to all that is good. If a girl dreams that she is breastfeeding a male child with a bottle, it expresses her tenderness and the intensity of her resistance to difficulties with an open heart and the positive and cheerful actions that she offers to others. As for If an unmarried girl dreams that she is breastfeeding a child with a bottle, this indicates her nature based on the Islamic religion. Interpretation of an unmarried girl breastfeeding a child from her left breast. The left side of the human body is the side of the heart, so if a single girl sees that she is breastfeeding a child or a child from the left breast in In a dream, this indicates that she is very loving, very kind, and will be a compassionate and compassionate mother to her sons and daughters. This dream can also be interpreted as improving the situation for the better, moving from a lower level to a higher level and resolving all crises and problems.

title: Interpretation of studying in a dream for different situations

preview.html: In this article, we take a look at the interpretation of studying in a dream to learn about the symbols and meanings of this dream. The vision of studying or going to school or university is one of the most common visions for us, whether the dreamer is a student or if he is a student, some may interpret it as a sign of fear and anxiety. If he is a graduate, this vision can be interpreted as a reflection of the dreamer’s feeling of wanting to return to the past and nostalgia for the past. However, interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, worked hard to determine the repercussions of this dream, either for a man or a woman, you can identify them in an encyclopedia.Interpretation Study in a dream - Interpretation of the dream of studying by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin interprets studying in a dream as an indication that you are engaged in something that occupies the dreamer’s mind. To see studying in a dream accompanied by seeing a teacher indicates excellence and success, whether educationally or professionally, but in the case of seeing the teacher, this vision is A reference to the wife. Among the dreams related to studying is school, as this dream means that a man will marry a girl on the basis of morals and religion, and this vision shows the abundance of food and the satisfaction of the parents. Seeing studying in a dream expresses how busy the dreamer is thinking about his future. Seeing yourself studying in The dream also indicates the dreamer’s responsibilities. Interpretation of studying in a dream for a single woman: This vision carries many connotations for an unmarried girl, as it is a sign of distinction and success, whether educational, professional, or emotional. Seeing studying for unmarried women also means marriage soon, and God knows best. If a woman sees an unmarried woman She is married to a teacher and a wedding was held with her. This indicates her marriage to an educated man, and God knows best. Seeing studying difficult subjects indicates the dreamer’s ability to face the difficulties she faces in reality. Interpretation of seeing studying in a dream for a married woman: Seeing studying in a dream is one of the good visions for a married woman, which It denotes goodness and living, and it is also a sign of success and excellence. If you see success in studying in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer has gone through many positive changes. Also, seeing studying in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of marital life and psychological comfort, as it News of happiness and joy for her. If a married woman sees that she is studying for a test but cannot answer his questions, then this vision shows that she is disobedient to God. Interpretation of a dream about studying for a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a pregnant woman, it is a good sign because it expresses the ease of childbirth, and God knows best. In the event that she sees A pregnant woman is studying for exams, then this vision expresses her fear and anxiety about the birth process. If a pregnant woman sees that she is in school, this vision is evidence that she will give birth to a child, and God knows best. At the end of this article, we must note that all of these mentioned interpretations express the interpretations of interpretation scholars. We cannot be sure of their fulfillment in reality, because only God knows the unseen. To interpret another dream, you can download the direct application for interpreting dreams from

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake |  Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake | Interpretation of the dream of seeing a snake in a dream: The snake is an animal that many fear and are sad to see, and as soon as it appears anywhere, they immediately stay away from it, knowing that it can harm them with the poison that it carries on its tongue. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about traveling in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin indicated Sirin, in his interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream, indicates that it indicates hatred and enmity and may indicate recovery from some bitterness. Whoever sees a snake in his dream and is suffering from an illness, this is good news for his recovery from his illness. As for someone who sees in a dream a large number of snakes, this vision is a warning to its owner that there is What he is aware of may be betrayal or betrayal by one of his relatives. Whether it is his neighbors or a close friend, the visionary must be careful in his vigilance. As for someone who dreams that a snake swallowed him, his vision indicates a lot of goodness, profit, and perhaps a promotion at work to the highest positions. As for the one who sees in a dream that he is eating snake meat, regardless of its color, his vision indicates that the dreamer is on the verge of prosperity and changing the circumstances of his life for the better. As for the one who sees in his dream that there is a group of snakes trying to attack him and on the Nile, he kills them. His vision shows that there is Many enemies surround him and try to harm him and harm him, but by killing them he will defeat his enemies. As for whoever sees in his dream colorful snakes, yellow, red, green, white and black, of different sizes. If they emerge from the ground, then seeing them warns the dreamer of the coming of many calamities. He must be careful of what he does, which may It harms him. Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream. Whoever sees a large snake in his dream, this is good news and evidence of kindness. If the person with insight suffers from a disease that is difficult to treat, he will recover soon. Interpretation of a dream of a snake bite in a dream. Whoever sees a snake in his dream, this is a warning whistle and a special warning. For him. If the snake is black or yellow in color, then its bite indicates something dangerous will happen to the visionary and he must be careful. The bite of the yellow snake also indicates the need to pay attention to health, as seeing it portends an illness that may affect the vision as a result of neglecting his health. As for the one who sees it in his dream If a snake bites his left hand, it is a warning to a person of a sin he has committed. As for someone who sees in his dream that a snake has bitten him in his right hand, his vision means sustenance and blessing with money. As for someone who sees in a dream that a snake bites his head, his vision indicates that the dreamer is going through a crisis. Great psychological. This is an indication that he will be exposed to other judgments as a result of wrong decisions he made. As for whoever sees in a dream that a snake bit him in his leg or foot, his vision indicates that there is something that the dreamer is striving for, but it will harm him, so you have to pay. Pay attention and withdraw from it. Interpretation of a dream about snake eggs in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that snake eggs hatch small snakes, his vision shows a lot of nutrition on his way to him. As for whoever sees in his dream one snake egg hatching, his vision indicates that he will get a new job, And perhaps the success of a project for him. Seeing a yellow snake in a dream.
